wikipedia_page.main: Sir Walter Ian Percival QC (11 May 1921 – 4 April 1998, aged 76) was a British Conservative Party politician.

response: George contested Southport at the 1970 general election but was defeated by the sitting Conservative MP, Ian Percival, coming third in the poll. He was elected to the House of Commons for Walsall South at the February 1974 general election.
